1054850.name: Storms
1054850.description:
Welcome to the Land of Storms. Few survive in this land. Luckily you and your allies have found the storm eye.

If you're looking for a refreshing, innovative, and challenging ARPG, you've found it. Decide your strengths by choosing one of three classes, Decide how to dispatch your foes with over 120 unique and game-changing skills. Decide what equipment to use with a vast loot system. Build shelter with fortress creation. Adapt to survive.

Storms was built from the ground-up on giving the player meaningful, interesting choices. The game is rewarding as it is challenging - choose wisely.

FEATURES
- Temperature, humidity, light-level, and inclement weather all have effects on combat. Use the environment to your advantage.
- A vast, to-the-point skill tree in which all skills change the way you play.
- Randomly generated worlds.
- Craft waypoints, personal chests, and fortresses to protect yourself from inclement weather and enemies. Beware - enemies can break your constructions.
- Hire mercenaries and gear them up.
- Loot!

Can you survive in The Land of Storms?
